There is only one IoT
custom solution. OneIoT.

Why? Choose OneIoT

The best IoT ecosystem for your end-to-end integration.
A compact all-in-one solution from hardware to the managed-device-system.

IoT Ecosystem

We offer a unique ecosystem that meets all the requirements of digitization. Hardware, managed device system, management system, data lake, analytics tool, API, smart home integration, customer frontend, community extensions and more.

End-to-end integration

Other platforms only offer one API and then let you down. We don't just give you an API, we take care of all the technical aspects of your integration from start to finish. We manage your digitization to success.

Hardware

With our easy plug-and-play hardware we power your IoT product, whether wifi or cellular. The OneIoT operating system handles the connectivity to the ecosystem. Bring your own hardware is also a possible solution.

Cost-efficient

Other platforms offer very expensive hardware. Outside industrial IoT it is impossible to integrate this hardware into low cost devices. Our hardware is the most cost-effective on the market and enables IoT for large and small devices.

Over-the-air updates

With our device management system you can easily manages your OTA updates. You can not only update the firmware of your devices, but also test new functions directly in the customer's field e.g. using a split test method.

Secure by default

Our ecosystem is built with the highest security standards. We use PKI-based device identity, key generation via HSM, state-of-the-art encryption technologies and AI-based data leak detection.

Analytics

You can monitor the health of your device in real time to arrange early repairs. By evaluating data, you can improve your product and better understand customer needs and device usage.

Plugins

Community extensions offer the opportunity to create an ecosystem that is always up-to-date and compatible with all standards and platforms. This allows us to offer maximum compatibility like no other.

Privacy

We adhere to the highest data protection standards according to German data protection law. This gives you full control over your data and that of your customers at all times.

Everything that can be digitized
will be digitized.

Products, processes and services are increasingly being digitised and are displacing non-digitised companies. If you want your company to be successful in the future, think about how you can igitize your business. We can help you with that.

Use cases. Increase your business

The Internet of Things is the key technology when it comes to digitization. Each device has the ability to communicate over the internet. This enables unexpected potentials and a huge economic value for almost all products on the market. We are convinced that we can also increase your business through IoT, so that you can continue to be successful in the future..

Example: E-Scooter Service

A sharing service requires that each scooter be monitored and analyzed. They want to monitor all scooters on a map via a dashboard so they can keep track of the scooter's locations.

If a scooter is outside the zone or driving too fast, the company may take appropriate action.

Example: Smart Aquarium

An aquarium owner can control the lighting and the pump via his smart home. In addition, he observes the water quality data. This way he knows at any time and in any place whether his fish are doing well.

Your idea

Our abstract ecosystem allows you to connect any type of device. Simply send the data to the ecosystem and our ecosystem will process all your requirements.

We develop your individual use cases according to your needs.

IoT Ecosystem. OneIoT, one solution

Compared to other platforms, we offer not only a platform, we provide a full ecosystem. The advantage of this is that an ecosystem is easy to expand. The entire IoT community and all companies can build their use cases on the system through simple customizing and extension. This allows us to create an all-in-one solution.

Managed Devices

It is the core module and all devices communicate with the ecosystem via WiFi, cellular or other protocols. Our hardware is pre-configured and optimized for the managed-device-system, this leads to an easy and fast integration.

All devices can be connected, whether machines, vehicles, appliances or battery-powered outdoor devices. The range of application is unlimited.

Management

With our management system you can easily manage all your devices, no matter where your devices are located. This also allows you to update your devices over-the-air.

That means that you can also test new features for a defined number of devices directly in the field. Then you can evaluate the new features and get important insights for your business.

Data Lake

Our big data lake can store all data of your devices. This ensures that no data is lost and can be analyzed later as well to ensure that no potential value is missed.

Big data analyses can be performed adapted to your business that helps your company to identify new opportunities. That leads to smarter business decisions, efficient operations, increased profits and happier customers.

Analytics

We offer a powerful analytics tool to analyze your data for added business value. You can use it to schedule the maintenance and service of your devices in detail, so you can avoid downtimes and increase your productivity.

You can also evaluate the use of your devices. This gives you valuable data to improve your product. You're answering simple questions like how is the device used? Where are the vulnerabilities? Which features are most frequently used? In this way, you can optimize the device and save money by preventing the development of unused usage.

Dashboard

We offer a comprehensive dashboard to map your entire device workflow, you can visualize and control your device data in real time. We also attach great importance to customizing the dashboard to your individual needs.

In addition, we offer your customers a web and app dashboard with which they can easily control your product.

API

With the OneIoT API you can use all functions of the ecosystem to write your own application. This also makes it possible to integrate functions into your own systems such as ERP. This way your business processes can be perfectly extended by IoT.

Smart Home

Unlike other platforms, we offer integration with all common Smart Home platforms. Your customers can thus control your product via their Smart Home. This allows you to offer your customers a smart product that can even be controlled via voice, e.g. via Alexa or Google Home.

Modern Smart Home products can be sold at a multiple price. This increases your business volume and puts you one step ahead of your competitors.

Plugins

Plugins provide the ability for everyone to extend the ecosystem to support all standards, platforms and protocols. This allows us to offer maximum compatibility like no other. Not only the community can extend the ecosystem, but also companies can integrate their own ideas and processes.

Hardware

The hardware is pre-installed with the OneIoT operating system, which guarantees the highest security standard. The pre-installation allows you to connect the hardware to the ecosystem via plug-and-play.

We offer a WiFi module for indoor use and a mobile phone module that is ideal for outdoor use. This allows us to cover all your needs. Of course there is also the possibility to use your own hardware.
